mapper.select: select spot_no, spot_name, spot_note from tbl_spot
mapper.update: update tbl_spot set city_code=#{city_code}, spot_name=#{spot_name}, spot_type_code=#{spot_type_code}, spot_note=#{spot_note}, spot_addr=#{spot_addr}, spot_lat=#{spot_lat}, spot_long=#{spot_long} where spot_no=#{spot_no}
